title: Postal Service: Sending Items (Usefulness 6)
description: Traveler usefulness 6/10 phrases for the Sending Items subcategory within Postal Service. Includes 5 card(s).

cards.english: I'm sending this to New York.
cards.japanese: ニューヨークへ送ります。

cards.english: I'm sending a postcard to New York.
cards.japanese: 葉書をニューヨークへ送ります。

cards.english: I'm sending a small package to Tokyo.
cards.japanese: 小包を東京に送ります。

cards.english: I'm sending a letter to New York.
cards.japanese: 手紙をニューヨークへ送ります。

cards.english: I'm sending a small package to New York.
cards.japanese: 小包をニューヨークへ送ります。
